fresh_translation.text: At the same time, John the Baptist was in a place called Aenon, near Salim, where there was a lot of water. Many people came to John because they wanted to say they were sorry for the wrong things they did. They wanted to be friends with God again and prepare their hearts to follow Jesus. When they were baptized, it was a special way to show that they believed in Jesus and obeyed God. John helped them make a commitment to be part of God's family and live the way God wants them to, just like Jesus was teaching everyone to do.

fresh_translation.text: At that time, John the Baptist was still out teaching people about God and helping them get ready to follow Jesus. He was not in prison yet. Many people came to him because they were sorry for the wrong things they did. They wanted to show God they loved Him and start fresh. When they were baptized, it was a special way to say they wanted to be close to God again. John helped them understand how to follow God's way.

fresh_translation.text: One day, some of John the Baptist's friends, who were called disciples, were talking with a Jewish man. They were discussing how to be right with God and what it means to make Him happy. They were learning about baptism, which is how people show God that they are sorry for the wrong things they have done and that they want to start fresh with Him. John the Baptist taught everyone that baptism is a special sign of love and a really important step in following Jesus.

They want to follow Him and show their love for God, just like you taught them. But why are so many people going to Him?"

fresh_translation.text: John the Baptist said, 'Remember, I told you that I am not the one everyone is looking for. I am like a friend who helps others get ready for Jesus. God sent me to share the good news and to help everyone make good choices so they can meet Jesus, who is our true Savior.'

fresh_translation.text: John said, 'Jesus is like a groom who loves his bride. I am his helper, like a friend who helps get everything ready. When I hear the groom's voice, it makes me really happy! fresh_translation.text: Jesus is the best of all because He came from heaven! People here on earth can only tell stories about what they see and know, but Jesus knows everything about God. fresh_translation.text: God loves Jesus, His Son, very much. He has given Jesus all power to help us because He is God's Son. Jesus knows what God wants us to do because He is the message from God. We can trust Jesus completely to show us how to live because He is so close to God.

fresh_translation.text: If you believe in Jesus, you will live forever with God, which is really wonderful! But if you choose not to believe in Him, you will miss out on that happiness with God.
